TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ContentDisposition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates that HTML-formatted content is presented inline; all other content is presented as an attachment.
Docs.remarks:
<!CDATA[
## Remarks This is used as a value for the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.ExportContentDisposition%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer> control to indicate whether content should be presented inline or as an attachment.
]>

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ContentDisposition AlwaysAttachment = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ContentDisposition AlwaysInline = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ContentDisposition OnlyHtmlInline = int32(2)
